Class WitchBarrier

  • java.lang.Object
    • WitchBarrier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class WitchBarrier
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A currently unimplemented class that makes use of a Spacetime object and two Portals to represent a witch labyrinth.
    Author:
    Jiayin Huang, Tony Cui, Sally Hui
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Portal entrance
      The Portal Entity that leads into the witch's labyrinth.
      protected Portal exit
      The Portal Entity that leads out of the witch's labyrinth.
      protected Spacetime labyrinth
      The Spacetime object representing the witch's labyrinth.
      protected Spacetime outside
      The Spacetime object representing the normal outside world.
      private static long serialVersionUID 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WitchBarrier(Spacetime outside, int width, int height)
      Dimensions are in units of TerrainTiles.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setEntrance(double x, double y, double theta)
      Sets the location of the entrance portal that leads into this WitchBarrier.
      void setExit(double x, double y, double theta)
      Sets the location of the exit portal that leads out to the outside world.

    • Field Detail

      • serialVersionUID

        private static final long serialVersionUID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • outside

        protected Spacetime outside
        The Spacetime object representing the normal outside world.

      • labyrinth

        protected Spacetime labyrinth
        The Spacetime object representing the witch's labyrinth. This should be separate from the normal outside world.

      • entrance

        protected Portal entrance
        The Portal Entity that leads into the witch's labyrinth.

      • exit

        protected Portal exit
        The Portal Entity that leads out of the witch's labyrinth.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WitchBarrier

        public WitchBarrier(Spacetime outside,
            int width,
            int height)
        Dimensions are in units of TerrainTiles.
        Parameters:
        outside - the Spacetime object representing the outside world *
        width - the width of the witch's labyrinth
        height - the height of the witch's labyrinth

    • Method Detail

      • setEntrance

        public void setEntrance(double x,
               double y,
               double theta)
        Sets the location of the entrance portal that leads into this WitchBarrier. This portal should be set in the normal outside world.
        Parameters:
        x - the desired x-coordinate of the entrance portal
        y - the desired y-coordinate of the entrance portal
        theta - the desired angle of the entrance portal

      • setExit

        public void setExit(double x,
           double y,
           double theta)
        Sets the location of the exit portal that leads out to the outside world. This portal is set inside of the witch labyrinth.
        Parameters:
        x - the desired x-coordinate of the exit portal
        y - the desired y-coordinate of the exit portal
        theta - the desired angle of the exit portal
